targets.query: from(bucket: "processo") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "s7_db1") |> last()

from(bucket: "processo") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "prometheus") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "plc_read_latency_ms") |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean)
from(bucket: "processo") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "s7_db1") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "contador_bom") |> last()
from(bucket: "processo") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "s7_db1") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "contador_ruim") |> last()

from(bucket: "processo") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "s7_db1") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "contador_bom") |> derivative(unit: 1m, nonNegative: true) |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean)
